title: Please enable normal draft while ranked queues are offline
body: It'll let us play something other than blind and aram, and there's no worries about splitting queues while a couple of them are gone anyway.

replies.body: why cant they just get rid of normal blind pick entirely and have only normal draft enabled, learning counter picks should be a fundamental of league.
If you got rid of Normal Blind, no one under the level of 10 could play, have you forgot something? ( {{summoner:11}} )

Actually, even if normal drafts doesn't make it (I doubt it considering the player support even despite the limited availability), this sounds like a thing that should have been implemented long ago. You don't lose lp for normal drafts and some people like to use normal drafts to warm up for ranked (because the format seems to just make everyone take it more seriously), so it'll help bide us over whilst riot gets on to bugfixing.

It original was in OCE, they took away Normal Draft because the player count on it dropped a lot, that's why they are trying to see if it's worth bringing it back, or even maybe making it like 3v3 Ranked.
OCE isn't the same server it was back then though...

Really? What's different now? New Champs, New Skins, New Gamemodes/Old Gamemodes.
That's all I could think of.
Maybe their severs have been upgraded, but have you thought about how much Bandwidth they pull through, how many players they do at once, how much ram is needed, how many different IP's are needed, how many different Servers are needed, remember each game is hosted on a Server. It's always been the same, no different.
